name: TheBestfriend
0:
”Alexa, open the best friend”
”Alexa, start the best friend”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the best friend
des:
Ask Alexa any of the questions that are included in the skill and she'll provide the corresponding answer. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer. 
The questions that are included in this skill are as follows:
1. How do I look?
2. Do I deserve a dessert after I have gained so much weight?
3. What different should I do today?
4. Tell me my greatest flaw.
5. Am I right?
6. Who is your favorite person?
7. How about a workout today?
8. Why do people ignore me?
9. What should I do to keep control on my anger?
10. Do I get a pet dog or a pet cat.
11. What should I do to keep the boredom away?
12. What is the weirdest thing that I do?
13. Is there anything that can make me happy?
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
